Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.input_management

Class CommandFilesReader

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.input_management.CommandFilesReader
public class CommandFilesReader extends Object
Singleton: the first time reads from disk all the CommandData from json format. Then, when an action id is asked, the CommandData is returned.

    • getCommandData

      public CommandData getCommandData(int actionId) throws NoSuchElementException
      Returns the CommandData for the requested Action if available.
      Parameters:
      actionId - the action of the CommandData that has to be returned
      Returns:
      requested CommandData
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the passed actionId is not present in any loaded CommandData

      Returns:
      requested CommandData
      Throws:
